name: Florida Staycation
short_description: Florida residents save 15% and receive 2 free welcome cocktails!
short_description_detail_page: Why leave the Sunshine State for a good time? Vacation like a local, but still feel like youâ€™re far away from the daily grind. With this offer, Florida residents save 15% and get free parking. Plus, your first cocktail is on us!
description:
Book this offer and enjoy:

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • 2 welcome cocktails
  • Complimentary parking for 1 vehicle
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, or bicycle rental
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (Downtown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions: Valid Florida ID is required at check-in. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. 1 vehicle in 1 space is included. Additional on-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
